channel.title: CVE Feed for Bosch -- Monitor Wall
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bosch -- Monitor Wall

item.title: CVE-2020-6789|2024-08-04T09:11:05.080Z -- bosch -- monitor%20wall
item.description: Loading a DLL through an Uncontrolled Search Path Element in the Bosch Monitor Wall installer up to and including version 10.00.0164 potentially allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code on a victim's system. A prerequisite is that the victim is tricked into placing a malicious DLL in the same directory where the installer is started from.
